fieldUpdates.description: Clear the value of the case priority field.
fieldUpdates.name: Clear Case Priority Field

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the Schedule Review Date on a Case.
fieldUpdates.name: Clear Case Review Date

fieldUpdates.name: Clear Shadow Case Flag

fieldUpdates.name: Set Case Priority to Normal

fieldUpdates.description: Sets the shadow case flag, which will trigger a shadow case object to be created.
fieldUpdates.name: Set Shadow Case Flag

fieldUpdates.description: Update the case status to Closed-SPAND.

outboundMessages.name: Case Outbound Message
Create case in JIRA via Zapier

rules.description: Automatically Close Exception Queue Emails from quarantine@messaging.microsoft.com and mdaemon@ecom01.ecomsg.mris.com

rules.fullName: Automatically Close SPAM emials RETS Queue
rules.description: Automatically Close SPAM email from RETS/MDS Queue where case subject contains SPAM.
Clears the value of the priority field when a case is assigned to a compliance exception queue.
rules.formula: Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Compliance Exception Queue' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Appeals Exceptions' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Violations Exception Queue' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Website Monitoring Exception Queue'

rules.description: Sets the flag to create a tracking object when a case is transferred to the Compliance team.
rules.formula: (Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'Compliance' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Compliance' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Compliance Exception Queue' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Appeals' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Violations Queue' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Violations Exception Queue') && NOT($Setup.Bypass_Validation_rules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c) && NOT($Setup.Case_Trigger_Flags__c.Disable_Case_Shadow_Object__c)

rules.fullName: Default Product for Content Licensing cases

rules.description: Sets the flag to create a tracking object when a case is transferred to the Compliance team.
rules.formula: Shadow_Case__c && NOT(Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'Compliance' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Compliance' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Compliance Exception Queue' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Appeals' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Violations Queue' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Violations Exception Queue') && NOT($Setup.Bypass_Validation_rules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c) && NOT($Setup.Case_Trigger_Flags__c.Disable_Case_Shadow_Object__c)

rules.description: RETS Round Robin Assignment email alert.
Copies Support Group from User Record to Group Closed By field on Case when Case is closed
Copies Support Group from User Record to Group Created By field on Case when Case is created
Set the the priority to "Normal" when a case is transferred out of a compliance exception queue.
rules.formula: NOT(Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Compliance Exception Queue' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Appeals Exceptions' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Violations Exception Queue' || Owner:Queue.QueueName = 'Website Monitoring Exception Queue') && ISPICKVAL(Priority,'')
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Origin,"Helpdesk@mris.net"), ISPICKVAL(Origin,"subscribe@mris.net"), ISPICKVAL(Origin,"Billing@mris.net"), ISPICKVAL(Origin,"logging@mris.net") ), ISCHANGED( Status ) )
